data: I don’t know yet whether I’m pleased or not, but I do know that I’m excited—more excited than I’ve ever been in my life, except perhaps when Miss Mackinstry, my last governess, had hysterics in the schoolroom and fainted among the tea things.

I don't know yet whether I'm pleased or not, but I do know that I'm excited--more excited than I've ever been in my life, except perhaps when Miss Mackinstry, my last governess, had hysterics in the schoolroom and fainted among the tea things.
Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris), 1859-1920; Williamson, A. M. (Alice Muriel), 1869-1933; Lowell, Orson, 1871-1956 [Illustrator]
